ca.ubc.cs.beta.smac.state
Interface StateSerializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
LegacyStateSerializer
public interface StateSerializer

Interface for saving aspects of the state After either/both of the RunHistory/PRNG are set call the save() method to write to disk.

Author:
seramage
